content:
@Vaida Plankyte has a GSoC proposal:

Page Illustrations

Landing Page Illustrations
Illustration Implementation & Page Redesign
Brand Guidelines Document & Consolidation
Zulip-themed Emoji Kit
Logged-in UI Redesign

Our existing design/frontend folks should probably take a look.
@Sumana Harihareswara thanks for setting up this post & the help!
Sure! You're getting into Zulip later than a lot of our GSoC applicants so I want to make sure you get a good shot :)

Looks great. I would expect there to be a lot of thinking that will need to go into what illustrations we need over time, so this would be by nature a fairly interactive project, but I think you have a good initial list of ideas for things that will likely want illustrations.
only saw this now, oops :') glad to hear the ideas i submitted sound realistic.
